name: Aftercare
headline: Conversational AI surveys with intelligent follow-up questions
description: Aftercare helps you run surveys with AI-powered follow-up questions to dig into responses for deeper insights—it’s like having a skilled interviewer for every survey.

founders.name: Aidan Lee, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder of Aftercare - Conversational AI surveys with intelligent follow-up questions.
ex-Growth Strategy at Datadog, Investment Banking at Barclays. 
NYU Stern '20

# Turn every survey into a _conversation_
## Get deeper insights by asking intelligent AI follow-up questions
[Start Building Now](https://getaftercare.com/<https:/surveys.getaftercare.com/>)
[Backed by ![Y Combinator's logo, which is a startup accelerator based in San Francisco.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6718312ed5163d13abae2307/6719429cf1756d020822cebf_YC%20Logo%20Expanded%20%E2%80%94%20Black.svg)](https://getaftercare.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/>)
[![Aftercare - AI-powered survey for in-depth user feedback | Product Hunt](https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/featured.svg?post_id=678142&theme=light)](https://getaftercare.com/<https:/www.producthunt.com/posts/aftercare?embed=true&utm_source=badge-featured&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-aftercare>)
[![Aftercare - AI-powered survey for in-depth user feedback | Product Hunt](https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/top-post-topic-badge.svg?post_id=678142&theme=light&period=weekly&topic_id=237)](https://getaftercare.com/<https:/www.producthunt.com/posts/aftercare?embed=true&utm_source=badge-top-post-topic-badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-aftercare>)
## Get to the _why_ behind the _what_ next-gen AI insights
### Intelligent follow-up questions
Use AI-driven follow-up questions to uncover more behind respondents' answers compared to traditional surveys.
![Aftercare AI Survey Icon, an "A" with a star integrated into the design](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6718312ed5163d13abae2307/678c708eec8afcb96acfce8c_Aftercare%20Icon%20Vector%20with%20Buffer_256pixel.png)
**_Q: What brought you to the SoftwareCon 2024?_**
**_A: I'm a product manager, and huge enthusiast of AI software!_**
**_Follow-up Q: What are the main items you wanted to accomplish by coming to the conference?_**
**_A: Our team is looking for a new project management tool, so I'm meeting vendors. I'm networking with other PMs - there's a meet-up going on at the Con!_**
## Deep AI analysis of all your responses
![Pause video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628299f8aa233b83918e24fd_Pause.svg)![Play video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628298b20ae0236682d4b87f_Play-24.svg)
![Pause video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628299f8aa233b83918e24fd_Pause.svg)![Play video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628298b20ae0236682d4b87f_Play-24.svg)
![Pause video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628299f8aa233b83918e24fd_Pause.svg)![Play video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628298b20ae0236682d4b87f_Play-24.svg)
### [Flexible Workflow BuilderAftercare's intuitive workflow builder lets you add AI follow-up questions, and create dynamic paths with branching logic. Customize with drag-and-drop blocks and visualize the entire flow at a glance, giving you complete control of your respondent's journey.](https://getaftercare.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)### [AI Response CategorizationAftercare automatically summarizes key information and categorizes open-ended responses. You can quickly understand trends in your data without having to manually categorize responses yourself.](https://getaftercare.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)### [AI Follow-upsAftercare shares a connected view of topic questions and intelligent follow-up questions to show answers respondents have been asked to elaborate on. View entire conversations and easily find specific details respondents have mentioned.](https://getaftercare.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
![Aftercare's small logo, which is a YC-backed survey company](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6718312ed5163d13abae2307/6718312ed5163d13abae241d_Aftercare%20Vector.svg)
Stop looking through spreadsheets... let Aftercare handle it!
[Start building now](https://getaftercare.com/<https:/auth.getaftercare.com/en/signup>)
## Run a survey as detailed as an _interviewer_ next-gen AI insights
### Try answering Aftercare yourself!
You can guide Aftercare with specific follow-up questions or a general direction for Aftercare's AI to dig into. Aftercare will adapt to a respondent's answers in real time.
![Aftercare AI Survey Icon, an "A" with a star integrated into the design](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6718312ed5163d13abae2307/678c708eec8afcb96acfce8c_Aftercare%20Icon%20Vector%20with%20Buffer_256pixel.png)
## Collaborate & share with your teammates
![Aftercare's small logo, which is a YC-backed survey company](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6718312ed5163d13abae2307/6718312ed5163d13abae241d_Aftercare%20Vector.svg)
Start on a free workspace today or upgrade to a team plan for more responses & collaboration features.
[Try Aftercare for free](https://getaftercare.com/<https:/auth.getaftercare.com/en/signup>)
## Built by engineers from

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Aftercare**

Founded in 2024 and based in the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco, Aftercare is a startup that leverages the power of conversational AI to transform how surveys are conducted. It’s not just about collecting data; it’s about extracting deeper insights through intelligent follow-up questions. This approach effectively turns every survey response into a mini-interview, allowing businesses to understand the 'why' behind the 'what.'

As a part of Y Combinator's W24 batch, Aftercare is backed by a solid group of tech enthusiasts and engineers hailing from notable companies like Nextdoor, Palantir, Datadog, and Microsoft. With a compact team of three, led by Group Partner Diana Hu, Aftercare is focused on making surveys more interactive and insightful.

### Core Offerings

Aftercare's platform includes several innovative products:
- **AI Survey Platform:** Facilitates streamlined survey creation while integrating follow-up questions.
- **AI Follow-up API:** Enhances existing surveys with intelligent follow-up capabilities.
- **AI Data Quality API:** Ensures the integrity and quality of collected data.

The platform also boasts various survey templates tailored to specific needs, such as market research, customer satisfaction (CSAT), exit surveys, and more—making it versatile for various industries.

### Features That Stand Out

1. **Intelligent Follow-up Questions:** Instead of standard multiple-choice responses, Aftercare empowers users to dive deeper into survey data, encouraging richer, more nuanced responses.
2. **Flexible Workflow Builder:** Users can easily customize survey paths with a simple drag-and-drop interface, adding dynamic branching logic based on respondents' answers.
3. **AI Response Categorization:** This feature automatically sorts and summarizes responses, allowing businesses to quickly spot trends without getting lost in spreadsheets.

### Why It Matters

In an age where data is invaluable, Aftercare promises to save organizations time and enhance their understanding of customers’ needs. By making surveys conversational and responsive, it shifts the traditional survey model toward a more engaging experience—one that can adapt in real-time based on participant feedback.

Think about it: What if your surveys could be as engaging and informative as a dialogue? That’s the vision Aftercare is pushing forward.

For more information, check out their website at [Aftercare](https://getaftercare.com).

---

In summary, Aftercare is not just collecting data; it’s harnessing the nuances of human conversation to redefine the survey space. They’re making it easier—and a lot more insightful—for organizations to understand their audiences. Keep an eye on them; they might just be doing the next big thing in feedback analysis.
